Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: The latest barrage of social media posts from people in Australia shows that the upcoming federal budget is a contentious issue. While General Practitioners are pushing for changes to help more people afford healthcare coverage the country's homeless young people are calling for increased support from the government. Meanwhile the ongoing issue of JobSeeker payments continues to divide opinions with some criticizing the opposition party for not pledging to lift the "seriously inadequate" rate. The LNP is now ramping up its campaign to secure Ring Road funding while many Australians express their frustrations over what they describe as "unconscionable deliberate and malicious cruelty."
